flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Turn fall leaves into a springtime rose. This is a super fast craft and appropriate for toddler helpers.

We discovered the technique by accident on our leaf walk this morning, and it was so delightful we wanted to share it.

The rose is made of leaves, not paper, but the category of Paper Crafts seemed like the best match, somehow.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Turn fall leaves into a springtime rose. This is a super fast craft and appropriate for toddler helpers.

We discovered the technique by accident on our leaf walk this morning, and it was so delightful we wanted to share it.

The rose is made of leaves, not paper, but the category of Paper Crafts seemed like the best match, somehow.

Relevant parts
  • yellow gingko leaves

lines.text: Find a gingko tree. Here are some in my 'hood, which is awash in yellow these days. So nice!
lines.text_raw: Find a gingko tree. Here are some in my 'hood, which is awash in yellow these days. So nice!

lines.text: Collect at least 10 of the leaves per rose in a variety of sizes. A bit of curl in the small ones is helpful.
lines.text_raw: Collect at least 10 of the leaves per rose in a variety of sizes. A bit of curl in the small ones is helpful.

lines.text: Collect the leaves by their stems, rotating for each one.
lines.text_raw: Collect the leaves by their stems, rotating for each one.

lines.text: I've used 11 leaves. I think it's done.
lines.text_raw: I've used 11 leaves. I think it's done.

lines.text: Tie thin string to keep the stems together. I pulled something from my recycled-gift-ribbon pile. I think it's a strand of raffia, maybe?
lines.text_raw: Tie thin string to keep the stems together. I pulled something from my recycled-gift-ribbon pile. I think it's a strand of raffia, maybe?

lines.text: Voilà! A yellow rose made out of fall leaves. I can't wait to see what happens as it dries.
lines.text_raw: Voilà! A yellow rose made out of fall leaves. I can't wait to see what happens as it dries.

lines.text: Let's go give it to a friend!
lines.text_raw: Let's go give it to a friend!

guide.summary: Gather fallen autumn gingko leaves together to make a yellow rose.
guide.title: Yellow Gingko Rose
